node.excerpt: Keep track of all your tasks directly inside of bridge.

node.excerpt: Adds an amethyst geode-inspired theme to select inside the settings window

node.title: Useful Presets

node.title: Basic Animated Background-Theme
node.excerpt: This theme uses properties never used before to create a really awesome looking animated background to level up your bridge. experience. For Dark Theme users ONLY.

node.title: Stone Theme
node.excerpt: An alternative light mode, with actual light mode now!

node.title: Block Tags Components
node.excerpt: Add two components to your entities that work with block tags to facilitate some works

node.title: Biome Themes
node.excerpt: Adds multiple biome themes to select inside the settings window

node.title: DarkBlue Theme
node.excerpt: Adds a new dark blue color theme to select inside the settings window.
